items.sentence: I should study tonight, but I\'m tired so I\'m going to bed.
Why didn\'t you guys tell me you didn\'t want to go camping?
Why didn\'t you tell me you couldn\'t do it without my help?
Tom always checks the caller ID before he answers the phone.
Tom and Mary exchange more than 200 text messages every day.
Tom asked me if I would be willing to contribute some money.
Tom believes that the universe really has eleven dimensions.
Mary and her family came to the train station to see us off.
Mary used her smartphone as a mirror to touch-up her makeup.
Mary usually has a few glasses of wine while cooking dinner.
